message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you trying to make a deal. I'm really interested in the product but $150 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. How about $105? I think that's a fair price for both of us.

I understand you're looking for a fair price, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $137.50. It's a compromise that I think is reasonable given the product's value.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $137.50 is still a bit high for my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $115.  This is a good price for both of us and would allow us to finalize the deal.

I'm glad you're willing to meet me at $115, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to accept that price yet. I'm willing to make one more concession, and I'll meet you at $125. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, and I think it's still a great value for the product.
